axis_supply.supply_status: Poor. CC.NN. divisions received lowest priority for supplies compared to regular Army divisions. Division surrounded at Bardia from 1 December 1940, isolated from main supply lines. Water shortage critical in static defensive positions.

allied_supply.supply_status: Adequate for East Africa deployment and initial operations. Division still completing mobilization and training in theater. Supply lines from Mombasa port to forward positions in northern Kenya operational but challenged by poor road infrastructure and long distances. Water supply critical constraint in semi-arid border regions. Main concern: completing equipment deliveries from South Africa.
